message.body: My flight has been delayed. I might not be in ATL until 10:45, a little after you land.
Hunter, it looks like your original flight has been canceled. Did they put you on s different one?
Yeah my flight is cancelled. They gave me another flight automatically that I thought was for 830 am but it's for 830 pm. I'm trying to find out if I can get an earlier flight
O.K. The funeral is at 4, so if you're not in ATL by 2pm, I'd ask them to just refund the ticket.
If at airport, sometimes the phones are faster than the desks.
2:30 would probably be the absolute latest
Ok trying to get on a 10:15 flight. I'm priority standby. If I can't get it I'm probably gonna get a refund and go home
O.K. I should be in the air by then. What's the flight number?
O.K. If not on, text/call me. Otherwise, I'll assume you're on that flight.
We're boarding. Just let me know what happens.
I'm not going to make it
I got a refund for you. I'm sorry
Not a problem. Sorry you had to spend all morning at the airport.
